abstract: The Weinstein Company said that it planned to release a “special edition” of the film about J.D. Salinger with the additions. Also, the company plans a dramatic film based on the writer’s life.
snippet: The Weinstein Company said that it planned to release a “special edition” of the film about J.D. Salinger with the additions. Also, the company plans a dramatic film based on the writer’s life.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — “Salinger,” Shane Salerno’s documentary about the secret life of J. D. Salinger, is set to reveal some more secrets.

headline.main: ‘Salinger’ to Add Details on Relationships With Young Women
